symptoms.name: Painless mass
symptoms.pattern: Non-ulcerative mass on the floor of the mouth (early stage)

symptoms.name: Tongue numbness
symptoms.pattern: Due to lingual nerve paralysis (advanced stage)

symptoms.name: Submandibular gland swelling
symptoms.pattern: Due to tumor obstruction of the submandibular duct

physical_findings: Submucosal mass in the floor of the mouth

imaging_findings.CT: Well-defined mass in the sublingual space, may show abutment to the mandible (without invasion)
imaging_findings.MRI: Well-defined mass in the sublingual space, may show abutment to the mandible (without invasion)

required: Imaging findings consistent with a mass in the sublingual gland
supportive: Symptoms of a mass in the floor of the mouth
